Name: Pterodactyl Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Pterodactyl, where are you taking me? Enables you to double-jump and travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
Pterodactyl, where are you taking me? Enables you to double-jump and travel very fast. Double-click your destination on the World Map and you will automatically fly toward it along the navigation route. (Auto flight is available only on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can expand your Smart Mount-permitted continents by buying Flight Permits from Instructor Irvin.)
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Pterodactyl, where are you taking me? Enables you to double-jump and travel very fast.

H.Old: DEF: +10, MSPD: 170, Auto Pilot MSPD: Very Fast, Jump: 120
